fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Plunder: Gain a non-special card of your choice every Night phase. [Activates D2] 
- Loot: Whenever you Kill someone, take all of the cards they did not use.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Pillage: Pick 3 players. Take a random card from each of them immediately. [1 use]
- Threaten: When in a trade, take all cards from the opposing player immediately. [1 use, Unique]
- Coerce: Pick a player. See their entire hand with modifiers. Play up to 2 cards for them. [1 use, Unique]
- Intimidate: Prevent half of True Order members from drawing this phase. [1 use, Unique]
